synopsis: Unusual circumstances forces Yuta and Rikka to live under one roof. Keeping it under wraps is top priority as the new school year starts.

title.jp: Dolphin Ring Striker (海豚の・・・恋人契約

synopsis: Yuta and Rikka's relationship sparks a renewed interest with their friends, and they are not too pleased to hear about the current status of their relationship.
Yuta's childhood friend makes an appearance, much to the dismay of Rikka, who must fight her jealousy.

title.jp: Mukunaru... Queen Maker (無垢なる・・・生徒会長選挙

synopsis: Shinka attempts to run for Student Council president, but a pesky little blonde girl is foiling her every attempt at normalcy.

title.jp: Gensou no... Siesta Labyrinth (幻想の・・・昼寝迷宮

synopsis: The Magical Napping Society - Summer is in danger of being disbanded, naturally the only solution is to start napping, competitively.

title.jp: Tamerai no... Tsukushino Shima Travelling (躊躇(ためら)いの・・・筑紫島周遊

synopsis: The class trip is here, and while Rikka and Sanae must separate, now is a good time for her to get some alone time with Yuta… if their class mates let them!

title.jp: Volcano Triangle (すれ違いの・・・心模様

synopsis: Hoping for a peaceful day of sightseeing with Rikka, Yuta's day take a turn when Shichimiya suddenly appears.

title.jp: Itsuwari no... Mori Summer (偽りの・・・精霊聖母

synopsis: Sanae and Shinka begin questioning who the real Mori Summer is when a new website appears created by Mori Summer.

title.jp: Resort Last Resort (波打際の・・・究極奥義

synopsis: While helping Kumin's aunt run a shop by the beach, Rikka realizes that her powers are fading...and she may want them to.

title.jp: Gauntlet of Rain (真夏の夜の・・・雨と鞭

synopsis: Satone continues to wrestle with her newfound feelings, and only one thing can save her from herself: a showdown!

title.jp: Blue Moon Ragnarok (青き月の・・・最終決戦

synopsis: Rikka is determined to find the necessary items to revive the Dark Flame Dragon, and puts herself in danger in the process.

title.jp: Tasogare no... Higher Engage (黄昏の・・・上級契約

synopsis: Rikka is acting strangely around Yuta, and it takes all of her courage to confess her true feelings to him.
